title: Ticket #4021: DAGMan immediately evaluates abort-dag-on on PRE script return val
description: When a PRE script finishes, DAGMan immediately evaluates the PRE script exit value against the ABORT-DAG-ON value. To be consistent with other aspects of DAGMan, we should probably only evaluate against abort-dag-on when the entire node has finished (in other words, after the POST script is run, if there is one).
creator: wenger
